pages.text: This mod adds two new dimensions, which can only be reached with a $(l:e_item_teleportation_crystal)Teleportation Crystal/el./br1The first one is the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity Dimension/el, which is similar to the overworld./br1The second dimension you can reach is the $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth Dimension/el, which is very useful for mining.
